name: Stickman Nights Survival Game
description:
Now you were in a terrible laboratory at night. Beware mysterious creatures - anima robots and anima toys.
Do not let them sneak up at night!
You are the guard in this secret laboratory. You are all alone and no one can help you...

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
- Watch out for terrible creatures with surveillance cameras - they move only when you do not see them!
- Beware of their attacks!
- The time is displayed at the top of the screen. Try to survive until morning!
- Switch the camera in the menu.
- Cameras have a charge that can end if you use the cameras for a long time. When you turn them off, you can restore the charge and then continue to watch the creatures.

Features of the game Stickman Nights Survival Game:
- survival simulator game
- a mysterious base on an abandoned island
- try to survive five, six or seven nights and more
- the terrible creatures that you have not seen before
- cool special effects and sounds

Start survival adventure now! The night is near...
